ClassDesc: Object used to encapsulate the data to be used to build the https:##developer#android#com@B_android#app#PendingIntent_E@ object associated with a given content recommendation, at the time this recommendation gets posted to the home Screen. The members of this object correspond to the fields passed into the https:##developer#android#com@B_android#app#PendingIntent_E@ factory methods, when creating a new PendingIntent.
